titleStmt.title: False fictions and romances rebuked in answer to pretended matter charged against the Quaker, in a book, intituled, The progress of sin, &c. written by B. K. His lies and slanders therein returned back upon him, and the speakers of yea and nay in truth vindicated. By James Park.
titleStmt.author: Parke, James, 1636-1696.

notesStmt.note: B. K. = Benjamin Keach. This work is a reply to: Keach, Benjamin. The progress of sin. 1684.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
